### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (62.5, -61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an OffshorePump at position (107.5, -33.5) with a fluid box containing water and a connection to a pipe group.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and a connection to a pipe group.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a SteamEngine at position (117.5, -30.5) with no input liquid and a connection to a pipe group.

### Pipe Group 1
Consists of a group of pipes connecting the OffshorePump to the Boiler, including pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Pipe Group 2
Consists of a group of pipes connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine, including pipes at positions (111.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (114.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), and (116.5, -33.5).

### Electricity Group
Consists of a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5) with a voltage of 0.

### Belt
Consists of a belt at position (63.5, -53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect with a pipe.
- Check that the pipe is not already occupied by another entity.

### Errors when using inserters
- Make sure the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Ensure that the inserter has a valid source and destination.

### Errors when placing entities
- Check that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables:
- `transport-belt`: 8
- `small-electric-pole`: 1
- `pipe`: 20
- `stone-furnace`: 1
- `wood`: 7
- `iron-ore`: 6
- `copper-ore`: 20
- `iron-plate`: 613
- `copper-plate`: 5
- `copper-cable`: 2
- `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
